meanings.definition: To perform an ollie on a skateboard.
meanings.sent1: He ollied over the curb effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: She ollied higher than anyone else in the skate park.
meanings.sent3: The cat ollied onto the couch to catch the laser pointer.
meanings.sent4: The dancer ollied across the stage with grace and precision.
meanings.sent5: The skateboarder ollied over the gap, landing perfectly on the other side.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he ollied over the rail and impressed everyone.
meanings.sent2: She ollied onto the ramp and then smoothly rode down.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel ollied up the tree to escape the chasing dog.
meanings.sent4: The idea ollied into his mind suddenly, sparking a new invention.
meanings.sent5: The memory ollied back into his thoughts, bringing a smile to his face.
